H3.text: how many house of representative do we have in nigeria. 360

A4.text: The Green Chamber has 360 members who are elected in single-member constituencies using the plurality (or first-past-the-post) system, most recently in 2023.

A5.text: The House of Representatives consists of 360 members, each representing a federal constituency.
